hgeStringTable helper class

hgeStringTable is a HGE helper class that automates text strings management. You may define all your strings in a single text file and use hgeStringTable instance to access them by name.

hgeStringTable methods

Constructor Creates and initalizes hgeStringTable object.
GetString Returns a string specified by it's name.

Related information

String table file

Requirements

Header: hgestrings.h
Import library: hgehelp.lib
